titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Esther Merrell Stockton Papers, 1925-1994 (bulk 1925-1930)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2010

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: The Stockton collection consists mostly of material related to Stockton's experiences at Camp Chequesset, a summer camp for girls on Cape Cod, from 1925-1930. Elizabeth Bishop also attended the camp during that period. There are snaps of Bishop in a photograph album and some of her early poetry is included in the camp newsletters.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Esther Merrell Stockton (ca. 1909-1996) was an interior designer, draftsman, artist, and poet. As a teenager she spent several summers at Camp Chequesset, a summer camp for girls on Cape Cod. While there she befriended Elizabeth Bishop, whose camp name was "Bishie."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Stockton collection consists mostly of material related to Stockton's experiences at Camp Chequesset, a summer camp for girls on Cape Cod, from 1925-1930. Elizabeth Bishop also attend the camp during that period. There are snaps of Bishop in the photograph album and some of her early poetry is included in the camp newsletters.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At some point between 2005-2009, the pages in the photo album were taken out of original order. Some attempt was made to provide some kind of order in 2009, but dates should not be assumed from the order of the pages.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Betsy Stockton Chamberlin, May 1998 [M2005-002].

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Esther Merrell Stockton Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
